Weatherproofing kids since 1944

For 80 years, we've been designing award-winning clothing and footwear for kids from our home in Helsinki, Finland. With our long history and Nordic know-how, we've brought new innovations and age-specific designs to kidswear, so all kids can confidently explore their world.

Room to grow, saving you money

We design our snowsuits with 2-3 inches of room for growth, so your child should get a couple of seasons out of their snowsuit.

With extra space and durable fabrics, Reima snowsuits can be used year-to-year and passed down to the next child when outgrown.

Shop snowsuits

Layering in 1+2+3

1. Base layer that manages moisture and is comfortable against the skin all day long. Wool or Thermolite is a great choice here.

2. Mid layer made from fluffy fleece or warm wool are great choices here.

3. Outer Layer that is windproof, waterproof & breathable! All of our winter outerwear checks these boxes!

Shop warm layers

No PFA chemicals here

All Reima products are 100% PFAS-free.

We create all our clothing and shoes to be good for kids, so you won't find any harmful chemicals in our products.

Weatherproofing kids since 1944

Reima is the leading premium performance wear brand for active children ages 0 to 14. We want kids to discover the joy of movement so it stays with them for life. Since 1944 Reima has been there every day, in every weather and for every experience, wherever adventure awaits. From playground fun to family hiking adventures, our outerwear is made to move.

Our children’s spring and winter jackets are waterproof and breathable to keep kids warm and dry in all weather. Beat the rainy day blues with our colorful selection of rainwear, made from hard-wearing, non-toxic fabrics that are easy to care for and free from harmful fluorocarbons. Essential mid-layers and innerwear keep the chill at bay so kids can play outside as long as they want. Our kids’ shoes are waterproof, comfortable, and machine-washable. Everything kids (and parents) need for fun-filled days outdoors and our swimwear is made from recycled materials and also protects little ones from the sun with SPF 50 protection.

At Reima, our focus on children’s well-being applies to everything we do. That’s why we’re committed to sustainability and using non-toxic materials in all our clothing. What is suitable for your kids is good for our environment. We think kids should enjoy the outdoors no matter the weather. Our gear is durable and non-toxic, protecting children and the planet. No wonder we’re loved and trusted by families who are happiest outside.
